Its cold at the studio! Desks have been built.
Just finished prison break... Crzy how they keep extending the story... Still enjoyable nonetheless. Will try to run in the morning!
Twittering in bed... Pure crackberry addiction.
Is wondering why his prison break did not download... Damnit piratebay! You have let me down.

Productive first day at the studio... Still got lots to do. Right now its just one IKEA L desk... Still got the other half to build!

Typical chargers... A little burst but nothing to get excited over.

Omg I'm going to sleep now... At least I got lots of work done? See you in 12 hours/evening lol
Design mode.
Getting ready for some Rubio's.
And no please don't ask if it was phone sex.
Had really good service over the phone from a customer rep today... They DO exist, people! Made my day.
I love Advertising Age!

Its so cold... I busted out the "Asian" blanket. PS3 time.

Creative juices flowing... Too bad its so late!
